headline.main: A Marred Election in the Republic of Congo

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
keywords.name: subject

snippet: President Denis Sassou-Nguesso is not alone among African autocrats seeking lifetime rule through constitutional changes, rigged elections and political crackdowns.
lead_paragraph: President Denis Sassou-Nguesso is not alone among African autocrats seeking lifetime rule through constitutional changes, rigged elections and political crackdowns.
